actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Inhofe. Petition No: 103-22.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3835) to establish a national advisory referendum on limiting the terms of Members of Congress at the general election of 1994, and for the consideration of provisions for advisory referenda on a Balanced Budget Amendment and a Presidential Line-Item Veto.
short_title: Voters' Bill of Rights Resolution of 1994

summary.text: Voters' Bill of Rights Resolution of 1994 - Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3835 (establishing a national advisory referendum on limiting the terms of Members of Congress at the general election of 1994).

titles.title: Voters' Bill of Rights Resolution of 1994

Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3835) to establish a national advisory referendum on limiting the terms of Members of Congress at the general election of 1994, and for the consideration of provisions for advisory referenda on a Balanced Budget Amendment and a Presidential Line-Item Veto.
